sentences.en: Eisenhower could not afford a massive risk and setback.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔经受不起一次大规模的冒险和挫败.

sentences.en: He can be thanked for this setback.
He has suffered a serious setback in his political career.
sentences.cn: 他的政治生涯遭遇了一次严重挫折。

sentences.en: He met with many a setback in his lifetime.
sentences.cn: 他一生中遭到过许多挫折.

sentences.en: He was adamant that this setback does not mean he has reverted to type.
sentences.cn: 他坚持认为这次挫折并不意味着他已经回到原来的样子。

sentences.en: I am not going to let the setback throw me.
sentences.cn: 我不会因这一挫折而一蹶不振.

sentences.en: It is an unexpected setback in her fortunes.
sentences.cn: 这是她好运中的一次意外的挫折.

sentences.en: It was a severe setback to her recently pleased mental state.
sentences.cn: 这次打击使她刚才还兴冲冲的情绪受到严重挫伤.

sentences.en: It's just a temporary setback. Don't be discouraged.
sentences.cn: 这不过是尺蠖之屈,不要泄气.

sentences.en: She didn't seem to be perturbed by the setback.
sentences.cn: 她似乎并不为这次挫折感到不安.

sentences.en: She views every minor setback as a disaster.
sentences.cn: 她把每个较小的挫折都看成重大灾难.

sentences.en: The move represents a setback for the Middle East peace process.
sentences.cn: 这个行动意味着中东和平进程受挫。

sentences.en: The problems that have dogged him all year are just a temporary setback.
sentences.cn: 一时的挫折竟困扰了他一整年。

sentences.en: The team suffered a major setback when their best player was injured.
sentences.cn: 最优秀的队员受了伤，使得这支队伍的实力大打折扣。

sentences.en: The team’s hopes of playing in Europe suffered a setback last night.
sentences.cn: 球队赴欧洲参加比赛的希望昨晚遇到了阻碍。

sentences.en: Undaunted by his first setback, he decided to try once more.
sentences.cn: 不为最初的失败而动摇, 他决定再试一次.

trans.tran_en: a problem that delays or prevents progress, or makes things worse than they were
